Title: Relates to the time period for submitting reports regarding the valuation manual and makes provisions relating to such valuation manual permanent
Summary: Relates to the time period for submitting reports regarding the valuation manual; makes provisions relating to such valuation manual permanent.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 394 of the laws of 2018 amending the insurance law relating to the implementation of a valuation manual and relating to directing the department of financial services to study the impact of the implementation of such valuation manual, in relation to the time period for submitting reports and making such provisions permanent
